오늘 제가 메일받고 전화까지 받았는데요...

Linux, Windows를 어느정도 하시고, 네트웍에 대해서 좀 아시면
이메일이나 전화를 해보세요.
  네트웍장비에 대한 Technical Supporter 같은데요. 주로 Support할 대상이
한국에서 오는 건 가보네요. Recruiter가 빨리 좀 구했으면 하네요..^^
아 처음에 교육도 해준다니까 관심있으신 분들은 연락해보시면 좋을 듯...

이하는 메일 원문입니다.

Hello Hyeonok Heo, I am a recruiter for Pivotal. I was viewing resumes on workopolis and I came across yours and I noticed that you had some skills that match a position we have available. I just have a few questions for you. On your resume it states that you are willing to relocate, this position is in Mississauga near Toronto , I am wondering if you would be interested in moving here to pursue a career. My second question revolves around your qualifications, this position is a Bilingual Korean/English position in which you would need a strong background in Linux, Windows and networking, at what level would you say your skills are in each of the skills I listed above? Lastly below I have listed all of the job specs below. Here is the link for the company for your perusal. www.sbs.siemens.ca


Company Name: Siemens
Account: EMC
Role: Bilingual Technical Support
Status: 1 year contract to Full time- If performance standards are met FT is offered after 1 year
Shifts: 8hrs/day on a 24/7 schedule rotating every 2 weeks
Compensation: $20.00 per hour for duration of contract
Location: 6375 Shawson drive in Mississauga


Let me know if you feel this is a good fit for you.
